org.thounds.thoundsapi
Class RequestWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.thounds.thoundsapi.RequestWrapper

public class RequestWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

This class provide a list of static methods to manage the communication between a Java application and Thounds

Method Detail

login

public static boolean login(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
                     throws ThoundsConnectionException
Thounds login method.

Parameters:
username - is the mail address of an active Thounds user
password - is the password associated to the user
Returns:
true for successfull login, false otherwise
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted

logout

public static void logout()
Thounds logout method.

isLogged

public static boolean isLogged()
Return true if authentication credentials are set.

Returns:
true if authentication credentials are set, false otherwise

loadUserProfile

public static UserWrapper loadUserProfile()
                                   throws ThoundsConnectionException,
                                          IllegalThoundsObjectException
Method for retrieve the current user's informations. Require login.

Returns:
A UserWrapper object that represents the user
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

loadGenericUserProfile

public static UserWrapper loadGenericUserProfile(int userId)
                                          throws ThoundsConnectionException,
                                                 IllegalThoundsObjectException
Method for retrieve a generic user's informations according to the user code given as parameter. The user to retrieve must be a friend of the current user. Require login.

Parameters:
userId - Identification code of the user
Returns:
A UserWrapper object that represent the user.null if the code is about a not friend user
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

loadUserLibrary

public static ThoundsCollectionWrapper loadUserLibrary()
                                                throws IllegalThoundsObjectException,
                                                       ThoundsConnectionException
Method for retrieve the current user's library. Require login.

Returns:
A ThoundsCollectionWrapper object that represent the library of the current user
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

public static ThoundsCollectionWrapper loadUserLibrary(int page,
                                                       int perPage)
                                                throws IllegalThoundsObjectException,
                                                       ThoundsConnectionException
Method for retrieve the current user's library. Require login.

Parameters:
page - page number
perPage - number of thounds per page
Returns:
A ThoundsCollectionWrapper object that represent the library of the user
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

public static ThoundsCollectionWrapper loadGenericUserLibrary(int userId)
                                                       throws IllegalThoundsObjectException,
                                                              ThoundsConnectionException
Method for retrieve a generic user's library according to the user code given as parameter. The library to retrieve must be a library of the friend of the current user. Require login.

Parameters:
userId - Identification code of the user
Returns:
A ThoundsCollectionWrapper object that represent the library of the user
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

                                                              int page,
                                                              int perPage)
                                                       throws IllegalThoundsObjectException,
                                                              ThoundsConnectionException
Method for retrieve a generic user's library according to the user code given as parameter. The library to retrieve must be a library of the friend of the current user. Require login.

Parameters:
userId - Identification code of the user
page - page number
perPage - number of thounds to load at time
Returns:
A ThoundsCollectionWrapper object that represent the library of the user
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

loadThounds

public static ThoundWrapper loadThounds(int thoundId)
                                 throws ThoundsConnectionException,
                                        IllegalThoundsObjectException
Method for retrieve informations about a thound. Requires login only if requesting private (must be thound owner) or contacts (must be friend of thound owner) thounds.

Parameters:
thoundId - Identification code of the thound
Returns:
A ThoundWrapper object that contain the informations about the selected thound
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

loadThounds

public static ThoundWrapper loadThounds(java.lang.String thoundHash)
                                 throws ThoundsConnectionException,
                                        IllegalThoundsObjectException
Method for retrieve informations about a thound. Requires login only if requesting private (must be thound owner) or contacts (must be friend of thound owner) thounds.

Parameters:
thoundHash - Hash code of the thound
Returns:
A ThoundWrapper object that contain the informations about the selected thound
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted
IllegalThoundsObjectException - in case the retrieved object is broken

registrateUser

public static boolean registrateUser(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String mail,
                                     java.lang.String country,
                                     java.lang.String city,
                                     java.lang.String tags)
                              throws ThoundsConnectionException
Method to perform registration to Thounds.

Parameters:
name - user full name
mail - user email (used to login)
country - user country
city - user city
tags - tags associated (instruments, genres, etc.)
Returns:
true if user registration ends successfully, false otherwise
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException - in case the connection was aborted

createThound

public static boolean createThound(java.lang.String title,
                                   java.lang.String tags,
                                   int delay,
                                   int offset,
                                   int duration,
                                   java.lang.String privacy,
                                   java.lang.Integer bpm,
                                   java.lang.Double lat,
                                   java.lang.Double lng,
                                   java.lang.String thoundPath,
                                   java.lang.String coverPath)
                            throws ThoundsConnectionException
Method to create a new thound.

Parameters:
title - Thound's title
tags - list of tags associated to the thound (instrument, genre, etc.)
delay - audio file start delay in milliseconds (used to sync tracks)
offset - audio file start offset in milliseconds (used to trim tracks)
duration - audio file duration in milliseconds (used to trim tracks)
privacy - privacy level (one of private, contacts or public)
bpm - beats per minute
lat - latitude in degrees
lng - longitude in degrees
thoundPath - thound's file path
coverPath - thound's cover file path
Returns:
true if request end successfully, false otherwise
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException

createTrack

public static boolean createTrack(int thound_id,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String tags,
                                  int delay,
                                  int offset,
                                  int duration,
                                  java.lang.String privacy,
                                  java.lang.Integer bpm,
                                  java.lang.Double lat,
                                  java.lang.Double lng,
                                  java.lang.String thoundPath,
                                  java.lang.String coverPath)
                           throws ThoundsConnectionException
Method to add new track on an existing thound.

Parameters:
thound_id - id to add a new track (a new line) on an existing thound
title - Thound's title
tags - list of tags associated to the thound (instrument, genre, etc.)
delay - audio file start delay in milliseconds (used to sync tracks)
offset - audio file start offset in milliseconds (used to trim tracks)
duration - audio file duration in milliseconds (used to trim tracks)
privacy - privacy level (one of private, contacts or public)
bpm - beats per minute.
lat - latitude in degrees. Can be null.
lng - longitude in degrees. Can be null.
thoundPath - thound's file path
coverPath - thound's cover file path. Can be null;
Returns:
true if request end successfully, false otherwise
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException

public static boolean removeTrackNotification(int thoundId)
                                       throws ThoundsConnectionException
Parameters:
thoundId -
Returns:
Throws:
ThoundsConnectionException
